testSteps.description: Given Julia is a user at Elah the Bay

children.description: Julia waits until page element located by css ('input[type="email"]') does become visible
Julia enters "demo@hotelmanager.co" into page element located by css ('input[type="email"]')
Julia clicks on page element located by css ('button[type="submit"], input[type="submit"]')
Julia enters "5" into page element located by css ('input[type="number"]:nth-of-type(1)')
Julia enters "5" into page element located by css ('input[type="number"]:nth-of-type(2)')
Julia enters "5" into page element located by css ('input[type="number"]:nth-of-type(3)')
Julia enters "5" into page element located by css ('input[type="number"]:nth-of-type(4)')
Julia enters "5" into page element located by css ('input[type="number"]:nth-of-type(5)')
Julia enters "5" into page element located by css ('input[type="number"]:nth-of-type(6)')

testSteps.description: And Elah the Bay has messaging feature enabled
